bibdata.title: IEEE Recommended Practice for Motor Protection in Industrial and Commercial Power Systems
IEEE Recommended Practice for Motor Protection in Industrial and Commercial Power Systems

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The protection of motors used in industrial and commercial power systems is covered. It is likely to be of greatest value to the power-oriented engineer with limited experience in the area of protection and control. It can also be an aid to all engineers responsible for the electrical design of industrial and commercial power systems.

The protection of motors used in industrial and commercial power systems is covered. It is likely to be of greatest value to the power-oriented engineer with limited experience in the area of protection and control. It can also be an aid to all engineers responsible for the electrical design of industrial and commercial power systems.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
